entry.title: 2D Pixel Room Bedroom v1.0
entry.content:
A pixelated 2d room scene Cabinet doors and drawers with animation
Technical details
56 layers in total
1 PSB with adjustment layers
50 separate png images
includesï¼š
-eiling
-Bed
-slipper
-football
-carpet
-Chair
-Cup
-keyboard
-mouse
-cabinet
-Book
-computer
-curtain
-window
-Skirting
-floor
-wall
-drawer
-Cabinet door
Asset Store : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/2d-pixel-room-bedroom-207779#description

entry.title: Groundhog Match Kit For Playmaker v1.0
entry.content:
This kit helps you make match play games without code

Level parameters can be customized and detailed parameters can be used to make changes within the inspector
Easily create maps of different shapes in just a few steps
All fsm's are fully annotated

Asset Store : https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/slug/207214
